item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Christopher Martins
860 State St


From Devorah:
I spoke to Brian at Christopher Martin's and he said that he would have a happy hour buffet, and replenish it as long as the collective was there. He's also offering 2-4-1 for the FIRST drink (so one free drink) and their usual happy hour prices on drinks (50 cents off domestic bottles and well drinks and 25 cents off top shelf.) They have a whole computer set up process for pricing for happy hour, and unfortunatly they can only offer us special pricing on drinks until 7pm without changing the computer....but hey, at least we get a free drink!
item.name: 8/6 - Monday Happy Hour - Christopher Martin's
